item.description:
February is Mt. Washington month!

We are listing this trip multiple times in February hoping that we are able to get one "good weather" day for our ascent. Please RSVP for as many of these potential dates as possible.

We meet at 7:45 a.m. sharp in the Hikers Room of the Pinkham Notch Visitors Center (located on the lower level) for a gear check, safety briefing and to discuss the current weather and avalanche report. Due to the short days of winter we must be on the trail as soon as possible.

You MUST be ready to start up the mountain at 8:00 a.m. Arrive early if you need extra time. We will NOT wait for you.


** This event will only take place if the weather and conditions are favorable. **

** We will need at least 3 confirmed hikers for this event to take place **

** Due to the advanced and strenuous nature of this event you must have crampons as well as an ice axe and know how to use them **

** Prior experience with above timberline travel during winter conditions is required **

** All hikers will be pre-screened **
item.name: Mt. Washington
